summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Myrtle Street from East Marginal Way to a point 420 feet west of the west margin of 7th Avenue South; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8451 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
